snippet: The new Riad Star in Marrakesh was once the home of the entertainer Josephine Baker.
abstract: The new Riad Star in Marrakesh was once the home of the entertainer Josephine Baker.
lead_paragraph: The new seven-room boutique hotel in Marrakesh, Riad Star, offers a stylish and well-located base next to the Marrakesh Museum, as well as a little bit of stardust: it was the former home of entertainer Josephine Baker.

headline.main: In Marrakesh, Lodging With a Starry History
